title: Good job RIOT! (appreciation for the little things)
body:
Since the removal of green wards, the only way you can hear the sound effect of your ward is by buying a pink or sightstone, (but unless you're a supp you probably wont get sightone and pinks are hard to buy once you run out of space for items) so most of the time you just hear the Trinket 'ding' sound even though trinkets are 'normal' wards now. and even if you have purchased a ward skin you still cant hear it, and seeming that trinkets are 90% of the warding you almost never got to hear your ward sound (and some of them have really cool sounds)

but now this has changed (as of this last patch i think) so thanks riot, its just a small quality of life change, but it is nice and makes ward skins that much better.

GJ

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
